ComicInfo.Summary: Flambé, 1 of 5: Due to the alien sky writing, the FDA isn't enforcing the no-chicken policy as tightly as before. As part of this realignment of resources, Tony and Ceasar track down Daniel Migdalo, a former FDA agent who disappeared shortly after the alien writing appeared.
